name: Mekafusion #1 BS01-BRAVE
description:
Model : BS01-BRAVE ( Base Soldier no.01 - BRAVE )
Series : BEAST 

A Base soldier model. A base robot component for Mekafusion BEAST series. Designed as Brute fighters, they are programmed with survival and hunting skills. 


Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form the ultimate machines.

Collect Mekanical robots in each different faction of series in the metaverse.



★★★★★
